item.title: 【SAP HANA Triggers: Enhancing Database Logic and Automation】SAP HANA触发器：增强数据库逻辑和自动化
item.description:
【

SAP HANA is a powerful in-memory database platform that offers advanced features to manage and analyze data efficiently. Among these features, triggers play a crucial role in automating database operations and enforcing business logic at the database level. 

In this article, we will discuss SAP HANA triggers, their types, and practical use cases to demonstrate how they can be leveraged effectively.

】

SAP HANA是一个功能强大的内存数据库平台，可提供高级功能来高效管理和分析数据。在这些功能中，触发器在自动化数据库操作并在数据库级别执行业务逻辑中起着至关重要的作用。 

在本文中，我们将讨论SAP HANA触发器，它们的类型和实际用例，以说明如何有效利用它们。

item.title: 【Dynamically Scaling Containers With KEDA and IBM App Connect】使用KEDA和IBM App Connect动态缩放容器
item.description:
【

Planning for highly variable workloads has always been a difficult art, with the attendant risks of over-provisioning (leading to waste) or under-provisioning (leading to poor performance) of computing resources, but container-based solutions can handle the challenge in ways that would have been difficult in a static VM world. 

To address this in some common cases, KEDA (Kubernetes Event-Driven Autoscaling) provides a way to automatically scale containers based on metrics such as IBM MQ queue depths, allowing scaling up as needed and then down to zero when the load dies away.

】

规划高度可变的工作负载一直是一项艰巨的艺术，因为有过度提供（导致浪费）或不足的计算资源（导致性能较差）的风险，但是基于容器的解决方案可以以静态VM世界难以应对的方式应对挑战。 

To address this in some common cases, KEDA (Kubernetes Event-Driven Autoscaling) provides a way to automatically scale containers based on metrics such as IBM MQ queue depths, allowing scaling up根据需要，然后在负载死亡时将其下降到零。

item.title: 【Bridging Cloud and On-Premises Log Processing】桥接云和本地日志处理
item.description:
【

Modern cloud-native architectures require robust, scalable, and secure log processing solutions to monitor distributed applications. This study presents a hybrid solution for log collection, aggregation, and analysis using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) for log generation, Fluent Bit for log collection, Azure EventHub for intermediary aggregation, and Splunk deployed on an on-premises Apache CloudStack cluster for comprehensive log indexing and visualization. 

We detail the system’s design, implementation, and evaluation, demonstrating how this architecture supports reliable and scalable log processing for cloud-native workloads while retaining control over data on-premises.

】

现代云本地体系结构需要强大，可扩展和安全的日志处理解决方案来监视分布式应用程序。这项研究提供了用于日志收集，聚集和分析的混合解决方案，使用Azure Kubernetes服务（AKS）进行日志生成，流利的log集合，用于日志收集的位，用于中间聚集的Azure EventHub以及部署在本地的Apache CloudStack群集上，用于全面的日志和可视化。 

我们详细介绍了系统的设计，实施和评估，展示了该体系结构如何支持可靠且可扩展的日志处理，以用于云本地工作负载，同时保留对数据的控制。

item.title: 【Secure File Transfer as a Critical Component for AI Success】安全文件传输作为AI成功的关键组件
item.description:
【

Secure file transfer (SFT) has become one of the most crucial technologies in the modern Information technology (IT) landscape for ensuring data security and confidentiality. SFT is a hot topic in today’s world, especially when decisions are being made based on data. It is used to transfer data between systems in a secure manner to avoid the tempering of data or loss of data integrity. 

SFT helps in keeping track of data for audit trial purposes to ensure accountability and support compliance. This is even more so for AI projects, which rely on such data to be timely transferred, stored, and processed safely and accurately. 

】

安全文件传输（SFT）已成为现代信息技术（IT）领域中最关键的技术之一，以确保数据安全性和机密性。 SFT是当今世界上的热门话题，尤其是在根据数据做出决定时。它用于以安全的方式在系统之间传输数据，以避免数据的回火或数据完整性的丢失。

item.title: 【Frugal AI: How Efficiency is Reshaping the Future of Tech】节俭的AI：效率如何重塑技术的未来
item.description:
【

As the energy and climate footprint of digital technologies keeps accelerating, frugal AI emerges as an alternative that seeks to reconcile innovation with environmental responsibility. What is this approach? Can it truly establish itself against current ultra-powerful yet energy-intensive models? What are the challenges and opportunities associated with its adoption? Let's break it down.

At a global scale, digital technology today accounts for nearly 4% of greenhouse gas emissions, a figure that is steadily increasing, with an annual growth rate of 6%. This footprint is now comparable to that of the civil aviation sector. Around the world, digital energy consumption is following an exponential trajectory. But how can we balance technological innovation with environmental responsibility? And could frugal AI be a viable solution?

】

随着数字技术的能量和气候足迹不断加速，节俭的AI成为一种替代方案，试图将创新与环境责任调和。这是什么方法？它可以真正地与当前的超功能强度但能源密集型模型建立自己的建立？与采用相关的挑战和机遇是什么？让我们分解。

在全球范围内，当今的数字技术占温室气体排放的近4％，这一数字正在稳步增长，年增长率为6％。现在，这种足迹与民航部门相媲美。在世界范围内，数字能源消耗遵循指数轨迹。但是，我们如何平衡技术创新与环境责任？节俭的AI可以成为可行的解决方案吗？

item.title: 【Role of Data Annotation Services in AI-Powered Manufacturing】数据注释服务在AI驱动的制造中的作用
item.description:
【

Before diving deep into how AI/ML is a boon for manufacturers, let’s explore how the industry has evolved. Steam and water-powered mechanics disrupted manual processes, thus filling the demand versus supply gap. The introduction of assembly lines followed, allowing manufacturers to increase output while reducing product prices. Partial automation further empowered the manufacturers with mass production capability.

Finally, the next big breakthrough came with AI and ML, adding intelligence to the automation formula. In other words, AI is at the forefront of industrial revolution 4.0. Not only this, but a strategic combination of AI with new-age technologies such as cloud computing, IoT, robotics, etc., spearheads the manufacturing industry to new heights, making the processes more accurate, efficient, and scalable.

】

在深入研究AI/ML是制造商的福音之前，让我们探讨该行业的发展方式。蒸汽和水力力学破坏了手动过程，从而填补了需求与供应差距。随后引入了组装线，使制造商能够在降低产品价格的同时增加产出。部分自动化进一步授权制造商具有质量生产能力。

最后，下一个重大突破是AI和ML，为自动化公式增加了智能。换句话说，AI处于工业革命4.0的最前沿。不仅如此，而且AI与云计算，物联网，机器人技术等新时代技术的战略组合将制造行业带到了新的高度，使过程更加准确，高效且可扩展。
